body:
The [Module Commands for Shell Scripts](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/module_file_support.html#module-commands-for-shell-scripts) documentation does not seem to be consistent.

The prose talks about the `--shell` flag and `spack module find`, but the examples shows output from `spack module loads --dependencies py-numpy git`.

It's not obvious to me how the prose and the output are related or if they are.
title: "Module Commands for Shell Scripts" doc is not consistent
